projects.description: Created a website that provides different places and locations - so it helps the customer to select and go on a trip. This website usually shows the best places based on the customer reviews

projects.name: VOICE ASSISTANT
projects.description: Developed a Python-based Voice Assistant project utilizing libraries such as pyttsx3, pywhatkit, Wikipedia, pyjokes, and speechrecognition.

projects.name: Freelance Collaboration Space
projects.description: The freelance collaboration platform is an innovative online space built with React, Tailwind CSS, Node.js, Express, and React Vite. It serves as a bridge between clients and freelancers, facilitating efficient project management and communication. With its intuitive interface, the platform seeks to revolutionize the freelance landscape, promoting seamless collaboration and enhanced productivity.

experiences.description: During my 2-month virtual internship at Codeswape, I gained foundational skills in web development. I also learned the basics of Python Flask, which is used for creating full -stack projects. Furthermore, I mastered the fundamentals of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
